DOC.brief_summary: A study for the treatment of hormone refractory prostate cancer (HRPC) in patients previously treated with chemotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: A Study for the Treatment of Hormone Refractory Prostate Cancer (HRPC) in Patients Previously Treated With Chemotherapy
DOC.criteria: Histologically or cytologically confirmed prostate cancer. Prior chemotherapy regimen for prostate cancer History of other malignancy in the last 5 years Major surgery within the past 21 days
